ohu eda ratha්riyehi aa samaga sayanaya keleya. 17 dewiyanwahanse leyata kandunseka, aa garbhiniwa yakob nisa pasweni putha්rayeku waduwaya. 18 mage dasiya mage purushayata ma wisin dun heyin dewiyanwahanse mage kuli mata dunseka kiya leya ohuta issakhar yana namaya thabuwaya. 19 leya nawatha garbhiniwa yakob nisa haweni putha්rayeku waduwaya. 20 aa: dewiyanwahanse uthum dayadayak mata di thibe; mage purushaya nisa ma putha්rayan sadeneku wadu bawin ohu ma samaga wasanneya kiya ohuta sabulon yana namaya thabuwaya. 21 inpasu aa duweku wada aata dina yana namaya thabuwaya. 22 dewiyanwahanse rakhel sihikota aata kandi aa garbhini wenta salaswuseka. 23 aa garbhiniwa putha්rayeku wada: dewiyanwahanse mage nindawa pahakalasekayi kiwaya. 24 thawada aa: swaminwahanse thawath putha්rayeku mata ekathukaranasekwayi kiya ohuta yosep yana namaya thabuwaya. 25 rakhel yosep wadu pasu yakob labanta kathakota: magema sthanayatada mage ratatada yana pinisa ma harinna. 26 ma numbaata wadakota labagath mage bharyawanda mage daruwanda mata di yanta harapanna.

widesha aayojana thunehi pradhanin ha aayojana mandalaye sabhapathi aacharya lakshman jayawira mahatha janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha idiripitadi me giwisumwalata elambaimen anathuruwa janadhipathithuman wisin aayojakayanhata giwisum baradimata niyamithaya.kolambaa nagaraya kendra karaganimin chayina komiyunikeshan kanstraksans samagama amerikan dolar miliyana 1300 ka watinakamin yuthu aayojana wyapruthiyak kriyathmaka karana athara eeta kolambaa kotuwa nagara sanwardhana wyapruthiya, diyakadanayan idikirim, idam sakasim, bim sanwardhanaya, muhudu jala uman marga, marga sanwardhanaya athulu wyapruthi gananawak athulathwa thibe.mita amatharawa oostreliyawe proparti eeliyans kapital pudgalika samagama amerikan dolar miliyana 450 k ha awik intarnashanal injiniyarin (honkon) samagama saha nayis wiw inwestmant samagama (honkon) ekwa amerikan dolar miliyana 250 wyapruthi kolambaa sar jemis piris mawatha ha aar. ee. da mali mawatha kendra karaganimin aarambha karana athara mewa mishra wyapruthi bawa aayojana prawardhana amathi lakshman yapa abewardhana mahatha pawasiya.thawath aayojakayaku siya aayojanayan sidukirimata ekangathawaya palakara athi bawath ema giwisumata elambaimada boho wita ada sidukirimata hakiwanu athayi hethema kiweya.ayojana prawardhana amathyanshaye eeye (13) pawathi madhya hamuwedi amathiwaraya ese prakasha keleya.podu rajya mandalayiya wyaparika samuluwa sandaha des wides aayojakayan ha wyaparikayan 2100 wadi pirisak ekwa siti bawa pawasu ee mahatha atham piris palamu wathawata meratata pamina athi bawada pawasiya.brithanyayen pamanak aayojakayin ha wyaparakayin 138 deneku sahabhagi wi siti bawath krushikarmika, widulibala ha balashakthi, adhyapana, yatithala pahasukam athulu ansha rasaka aayojanayan sidukirimata kamaththa palakala bawath amathiwaraya kiya sitiyeya..
